page.title: 02BASSINGBOURN HOUSING ESTATES
page.content: When you leave A14 to come into the village along the Causeway the first main estate you come to is{Tower Close on the right. All the houses have four bedrooms. Next you come to{Elm Tree {Drive.}It leads to{Clarke's Way}which leads to{Willmott Road.}Most of these houses have three bedrooms. This estate is left of the Causeway. In a few hundred yards the Causeway ends and becomes the High Street. The first turning left is Spring Lane. Go left again and you find{Pepper Close. Then on the right are the old people's homes. Go right again and you are in {Knutsford Road.}Rejoining the High Street you find a cross roads. Turn left and you are in South End. On the left is the{Tanyard.}If you go into North End you find other estates. They are{Church Close, The Fillance, Park {View, Park Close & Walnut Tree Close.
